languages.text: Великолепные браслеты пиратского вождя Германиоса некогда были рабскими оковами на его руках. Подняв мятеж и обратив невольников в экипаж захваченного каторжного транспорта, Германиос повелел изукрасить их золотом и кристаллами. В знак уважения славный вожак повстанцев подарил их Вольному Торговцу.

The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.
languages.original_text: Великолепные браслеты пиратского вождя Германиоса некогда были рабскими оковами на его руках. Подняв мятеж и обратив невольников в экипаж захваченного каторжного транспорта, Германиос повелел изукрасить их золотом и кристаллами. В знак уважения славный вожак повстанцев подарил их Вольному Торговцу.

traits.locale_text: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave fetters on his hands. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave fetters on his hands. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

languages.text: 海盗首领赫曼纽斯华丽的手镯由奴隶的镣铐改造而成。赫曼纽斯发动了一场叛乱，在俘虏运输船的囚犯之中征募了他自己的可靠船员，重获自由，他的镣铐也黄金与水晶装饰起来。这位光荣的叛军领袖将这副手镯献给了行商浪人，以示敬意。
languages.original_text: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

traits.locale_text: 海盗首领赫曼纽斯华丽的手镯由奴隶的镣铐改造而成。赫曼纽斯发动了一场叛乱，在俘虏运输船的囚犯之中征募了他自己的可靠船员，重获自由，他的镣铐也黄金与水晶装饰起来。这位光荣的叛军领袖将这副手镯献给了行商浪人，以示敬意。

languages.text: 海賊のリーダー、ヘルマニオスの豪華なブレスレットは、かつては奴隷の手かせだった。反乱を起こし、拿捕した囚人輸送船の囚人から乗組員を打ち立てた後、ヘルマニオスはその鎖を金とクリスタルで飾り立てた。栄光ある反乱軍のリーダーは、ローグトレーダーに敬意を表してこの鎖を贈った。
languages.original_text: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

traits.locale_text: 海賊のリーダー、ヘルマニオスの豪華なブレスレットは、かつては奴隷の手かせだった。反乱を起こし、拿捕した囚人輸送船の囚人から乗組員を打ち立てた後、ヘルマニオスはその鎖を金とクリスタルで飾り立てた。栄光ある反乱軍のリーダーは、ローグトレーダーに敬意を表してこの鎖を贈った。

languages.text: Los magníficos brazaletes del líder pirata Hermanios fueron una vez grilletes de esclavo. Tras amotinarse y formar una tripulación a partir de los prisioneros del transporte capturado, Hermanios hizo que decoraran las cadenas con oro y cristales. El glorioso líder rebelde se los entregó a{mf|l| la} como muestra de respeto.
languages.original_text: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

traits.locale_text: Los magníficos brazaletes del líder pirata Hermanios fueron una vez grilletes de esclavo. Tras amotinarse y formar una tripulación a partir de los prisioneros del transporte capturado, Hermanios hizo que decoraran las cadenas con oro y cristales. El glorioso líder rebelde se los entregó a{mf|l| la} como muestra de respeto.

languages.text: Les magnifiques bracelets du chef pirate Hermanios étaient autrefois des fers d'esclave. Après avoir organisé une mutinerie et recruté un équipage parmi les prisonniers du transport de condamnés capturé, Hermanios a fait orner ses propres chaînes avec de l'or et des cristaux. Le glorieux chef rebelle les a par la suite offerts {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} en témoignage de son respect.
languages.original_text: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

traits.locale_text: Les magnifiques bracelets du chef pirate Hermanios étaient autrefois des fers d'esclave. Après avoir organisé une mutinerie et recruté un équipage parmi les prisonniers du transport de condamnés capturé, Hermanios a fait orner ses propres chaînes avec de l'or et des cristaux. Le glorieux chef rebelle les a par la suite offerts {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} en témoignage de son respect.

languages.text: Die prächtigen Armreife des Piratenanführers Hermanios waren einst Sklavenfesseln. Nachdem er eine Meuterei angezettelt und aus den Gefangenen des eroberten Häftlingstransporters eine Crew gemacht hatte, ließ Hermanios die Ketten mit Gold und Kristallen verzieren. Der ruhmreiche Rebellenanführer schenkte sie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} als Zeichen seines Respekts.
languages.original_text: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.
